message: Hi Bob, to avoid further rounds (which cost me value due to inflation) and knowing you won’t lose anything by waiting since your money isn’t discounted, I propose that you get the full $100 now and I take nothing. This way, you receive your full amount immediately, and we can end the negotiation promptly.
Alice, let's split the money equally. This way, both of us get a fair share and we can end the game. If we continue, you'll lose more value due to inflation.
